price: 10. Dheh: Bal ka warrama hadduu (Qur’aanka) ka yimid xagga Alle, oo aad ku gaalowdeen, uuna ka marag furay marag fure ka mid ah ilmahii Israa’iil5 inuu  la mid yahay (Towraadda), markaasuu rumeeyey6 halka aad idinku is kibriseen. Hubaal Alle ma hanuuniyo qoloda daalimiinta ah (madaxa adag).
arabic: قُلۡ أَرَءَيۡتُمۡ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ عِندِ ٱللَّهِ وَكَفَرۡتُم بِهِۦ وَشَهِدَ شَاهِدٞ مِّنۢ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ عَلَىٰ مِثۡلِهِۦ فَـَٔامَنَ وَٱسۡتَكۡبَرۡتُمۡۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي ٱلۡقَوۡمَ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes:
5. Waxaa loola jeedaa Cabdullaah bin Salaam. 
6. Hadalka ka go’an waa: Soo ma ahaaneysaan markaa kuwa ugu gef badan dadka? Ama xaalad noocee baad markaa ku sugnaan doontaan?

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul ara-aytum in kāna min ʿindi al-lahi wakafartum bihi washahida shāhidun min banī is'rāīla ʿalā mith'lihi faāmana wa-is'takbartum inna al-laha lā yahdī al-qawma al-ẓālimīna
